Title: Droughts, Locusts, and Plague: 16th-Century Transylvanian Diaries Expose Climate Chaos
Description: Historical texts, from official records to personal chronicles, are revealing how 16th-century weather shaped Transylvanian society.

Title: GSA staff faces massive cuts. And, could NASA launch a Mars mission?
Description:
The General Services Administration plans to cut its budget in half and ramp up monitoring of staff.
And, Elon Musk could help propel a NASA Mars program — or delay it for another generation.

Title: When her young son was hit by a pickup truck, a stranger ran over to help
Description:
Melissa Barbanell's 7-year-old son was severely injured after being hit by a pickup truck.
A stranger, who turned out to be a nurse, let Barbanell know he was going to be OK.

Title: Usher and his wife are both in the music industry. He says working together could 'damage' their relationship.
Description: "This is my third one," Usher said, referring to his marriage, "and I'm trying to make sure I don't take this ring off."

Title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei warns: AI will match ‘country of geniuses’ by 2026
Description:
Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei warns AI will reach genius-level capabilities by 2026, calling Paris Summit a "missed opportunity" as U.S.
and European leaders clash over regulation of rapidly advancing artificial intelligence systems.

Title: ‘Worrying’ decline in Dutch startups sparks call for extra growth capital
Description:

New data released today reveals the number of new startups in the Netherlands is declining.
The country is also suffering from a severe lack of local investors.

Title: Can you detect these deepfakes? 99.9% can’t, claims biometrics leader iProov
Description:
Deepfakes have become alarmingly difficult to detect.
So difficult, that only 0.1% of people today can identify them.
That’s according to iProov, a British biometric authentication firm.

Title: The Rise of America’s Broligarchy and What to Do About It
Description: Campaign finance rules and checks on presidential power are collapsing just as leading technology corporations have gained massive power over our political system.

Title: Democrats vow to fight shutdown of consumer watchdog agency
Description: President Donald Trump has said the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was "very important to get rid of."

Title: No Longer Posting to Pinboard

Title: The year I didn't survive
